 The only do I know is remember to laugh when "they" say something funny! =
I'm being serious!
 
 Frank-S


To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comFrom: paranormal=
investigating@...: Fri, 23 Nov 2007 17:38:10 -0500Subject: RE: =
[EVP-ITC] Re: Family hour around the radio




Babs, I am thinking of conta=
cting ron the maker of the mini box and offer to put a page on my box websi=
te explaining the do's and don'ts of box research and the dangers involved =
and also the resposibility involed in box ownership and research. And I'm h=
oping that will help some of the people who are going in blind and buying a=
 mini box will understand what the basics are. hopefully they can put a lin=
k on their mini box sale page. Bruce

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigati=
ng Team 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: babiarz3@...: Fri, 23=
 Nov 2007 22:13:56 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Family hour around the radio=



Hi Bruce~I understand the light heartedness of the "family hour" posts. =
I don'ttake any issue with that at all. The families of those of us involve=
din the paranormal HAVE to be a bit different then the average Joe's orSmit=
h's. I only referred to that topic because of the other stuffmentioned- neg=
ativity and dark ones.There is absolutely nothing in place to safe guard wh=
o purchases thebox and who doesn't besides the cost. If you've got the mone=
y or acredit card, the box is yours- whoever "you" are.I don't think we sho=
uld presume anything about the purchasers of thebox. I know people in the f=
iled who have never experienced anythingevil or dark and wouldn't know what=
 to do if they did. Admittedly,they can be and will be deceitful. I am in f=
ull support of further research and groups and individualsworking together.=
 However, IMHO, I think this falls into a differentcategory. Morally and et=
hically, I think it is short sighted toapprove of or promote in any way, th=
e distribution of this device atthis time. When we imagine the possibilitie=
s, we need to imagine them all.Babs --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce h=
alliday<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:>> babiarz3,> > I believe the po=
sts you are referring to about family hour with the box> where written in a=
 light manner in jest. I do not presume to speakfor anyone > else on this g=
roup I'm sure they can speak for themselves.> > you speak of responsibility=
 with any form of open communication, Ibelieve the individuals that are> st=
udying and distributing the mini box are sufficiently experiencedand know w=
ho they should sell to and who not.> > I don't believe they mean to put the=
 mini box on the shelves in toysr us. Anyone that uses a box whether it be =
a Frank's box> A Joe's box or a mini box will probably have done some resea=
rch intothis method of evp and will probably have some intimate experience>=
 with the paranormal field and if not I'm sure they will seek advicefrom th=
ose of us that have that experience. There is never a lack ofadvice here.> =
> as far as dark heads go I know through personal experience that theycan b=
e deceiving and manipulative with someone that does not know anybetter> I h=
ave a Frank's box and a Joe's box and do serious research on adaily basis. =
My opinion is the good spirits out weigh the negativeones and anyone> that =
experiments with a box will tell you that you do forge strongbonds with wha=
t I call my spirit guides or technicians, the same twospirits communicate >=
 with me during every session and protect me from negativity. As longas I d=
o not feed the darkies with my own negativity I am fine.> > Also I believe =
that the people who are distributing the mini boxhave set that price to det=
er any average person that's completelyignorant of the paranormal> away fro=
m purchasing this device.> > I have never met bill personally but know of h=
im, he is a wellrespected researcher and is well aware I think of the pitfa=
lls as wellas the rewards of box communication.> and I don't believe he wou=
ld ever endanger himself, his family oranyone else by carelessly using the =
box for entertainment purposes.> > that Is my opinion for what it's worth.>=
 > Bruce> > > Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team > > > To: EVP-IT=
C@...: babiarz3@...: Fri, 23 Nov 2007 19:58:45+0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: F=
amily hour around the radio> > > > > I am a fairly quiet person, most of th=
e time. I have my thoughtsandopinions on topics but feel strongly about "to=
 each his own".Unlesssomething strikes me as completely wrong, I won't deba=
te. No oneherehas heard from me other than recently with this mini-box yet,=
 Iamhere several times weekly reading and offering my energy in supportofth=
e research.However...something is striking me here and again, Ican't keep m=
ymouth shut. The discussion about the family hour with thebox has ledthe wa=
y for people to mention negativity and even "the darkguys" canbe fun if not=
 taken seriously.I ask you to consider the factthat many who purchase the m=
ini-boxwill not be of the right frame ofmind. Most will not be in harmony.M=
any will take "the dark guys"seriously. Yet, you feel it's a goodidea to le=
t anyone who wants a boxhave one? All in the name ofsharing technology.I kn=
ow that my previousposts expressing my concern over the massmarketing of th=
e box, wasbarely given consideration. Realize that Iam not being selfish- I=
 donot own a box. EVP is my passion and hasbeen from day one 6 years agowhe=
n I jumped fully into the field. I amsuccessful in capturing EVP,always hav=
e been. I still do it the "oldfashioned way" with open airtechniques. Would=
 I love to be able tohold real time 2 waycommunications with the other side=
? Of course.However, I do not thinkenough research into the possibilities h=
asbeen done to warrant theapproval let alone production of these boxes. Tho=
se of us who havebeen on countless investigations with many peoplewill quic=
kly admitthat there are some people we'd rather notinvestigate with. When t=
heyare present, negative things tend tohappen. We all know one or twopeople=
 who we can say "felt dark" fromthe first meeting. We all admitthat being m=
entally sound is animportant quality in this field. If youhave mental issue=
s, this maynot be the area of research for you. Wedon't bring children onin=
vestigations for obvious reasons. BUT! If youwant a box that couldpossibly =
open up a portal and bridge the gapbetween here and thedark, sure! Anyone w=
ho wants one should have it!You might feel that I am over reacting or being=
 overly dramatic.That'sfine. My concern is not what you think of me but tha=
t youconsider thepossibilities here. Many of which we do not know. Can youb=
e 100% surethat this is a good idea or that it's worthy of saying"well, we'=
ll seewhat happens"? --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, brucehalliday<paranorm=
alinvestigating@> wrote:>> Bill,> > You have theright idea, I recently have=
 dealt with a lot> of negativity from myFrank's box. Harmony is very import=
ant> as is the right frame of mindbefore turning the box on.> > hope you & =
the family had a goodholiday.> > Bruce> > Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investi=
gating Team > >> To: EVP-ITC@: vilhellm@: Fri, 23 Nov 2007 02:46:20+0000Sub=
ject:[EVP-ITC] Family hour around the radio> > > > > Maybe we're just alitt=
le unconventional in our household, but mostof us here are prettyopen to th=
e idea of the multiverse. Gathering ina circle around ourFrank's Box is our=
 idea of quality family time.The messages arerelevent, the interest is high=
, and we're very wellgrounded and do notlet the tricksters push us around.H=
appyThanksgiving from our home toyours. -Bill > > > > > > >________________=
__________________________________________> Connectand share in new ways wi=
th WindowsLive.>http://www.windowslive.com/connect.html?ocid=3DTXT_TAGLM_Wa=
